name: Talk Doorman
_source: s;OldMan1;Welcome to Roland Manor.{w} Who might you two be?
s;Anuki;Anuki Morrissey and Simon Verstadt.{w}{br}We're here for negotiations with Lord Roland.
s;OldMan1;Ah, Lady Morrissey and her fiance.{w}{br}Now let me see, let me see.
s;OldMan1;It appears you aren't on the list, Anuki Morrissey and Simon Verstadt.{w}{br}How strange, how strange.
s;Anuki;You'd refuse entry to two lords?{w}{br}You really think that'll help your boss's chance with negotiations?
s;OldMan1;Ack!{w} No, surely not. Surely not.{w}{br}Please head right this way, Anuki Morrissey and Simon Verstadt.{w}{br}His lordship awaits in the dining room.
s;Simon;What an odd man...{w}{br}This is off to a strange start.
